statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET username='new_username', avatar_url='new_avatar_url' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET avatar_url='another_avatar_url', username='another_username' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET username='john_doe', avatar_url='example.com/avatar1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET avatar_url='example.com/avatar2', username='jane_smith' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET avatar = 'new_avatar.png' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET score = 1000, level = 5 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET avatar = 'profile.jpg', username = 'john_doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET score = 1500, level = level + 1 WHERE player_id = (SELECT id FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe');
UPDATE player_profiles SET avatar_url = 'https://example.com/avatar1.jpg' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE player_stats SET high_score = 500, games_played = 10 WHERE player_id = 2
UPDATE player_stats SET high_score = 500, games_played = 10 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE player_logs SET log_timestamp = '2022-01-20 14:30:00', log_message = 'Logged in successfully' WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player_profiles SET avatar_url = 'image_url1' WHERE username = 'player1';
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 5 WHERE player_id = 2 AND item_id = 10;
UPDATE player_profiles SET username = 'John Smith', avatar_url = 'https://example.com/avatar.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET score = score + 10, level = level + 1 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET username = 'new_username' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE items SET quantity = 10, item_name = 'new_item_name' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET avatar_url = 'https://example.com/avatar1' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE items SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE item_name = 'Potion' AND player_id = 2;
